title: Prototype-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic arithmetic operations and fundamental algebraic concepts
context.additional_context: Improving mathematical thinking skills through real-life problem-solving activities using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can structure real-world mathematical problems by applying the prototype design process.
Learners can collaboratively develop mathematical models and visualize them using digital tools.
Learners can quantitatively explain problem-solving processes through project presentations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
